title: How should a dissertation look like? - Quora

response.answer_text: The best dissertation Answerss an unanswered question in your field—a question that if answered will contribute new an original knowledge to your fieldDemonstrates thorough familarity with all existing knowledge and literature relating to the problem.Embodies replicable methodology so that anyone reading it could replicate the same research and get the same verifiable resultsEmbodies thoroughly professional analysis using the latest techniques, equipment, and theoretical frameworksPresents the results in a clear, well-written, well-organized and thoroughly professional fashion.Makes clear the intellectual contribution of the research and how it adds to the knowledge of the field.

The “best” dissertation is a DONE DISSERTATION! Seriously, there are many things that go into making a good dissertation, including topic selection, research, writing, etc.; however, it all boils down to earning a doctorate, which is not possible unless/until the dissertation is completed and approved, e.g., “done”. For more on this topic, visit: Writing a Good PhD Dissertation or ThesisLawrence Ness's answer to What are some good dissertation tips?Lawrence Ness's answer to Assistant, what is a dissertation? in My Dissertation Coach

Guys, please, tell me please honestly, what does a dissertation look like? Well, I will be very thankful to those of you who will write the answer to this question to me. But even if you have no idea about this question right now, then please just read attentively this my article and I think that it will help you very much to get the answer to this question.  So, of course my first advise will concern the searching for this information in the google, because this is one of the most helpful ways find something. But if you will follow my advise and will use some search words, it will help you very much. So, here are some of them for you: Main body or discussionFindings/conclusionBibliographyAppendices.And as soon as you will find some website with such information, then please visit it as fast as possible.

Kevin is right that the answer can be different depending on the topic. Here is the common structure: Title page Abstract or summary (one separate page) Acknowledgement Author’s declaration Contents List of Figures List of Tables List of accompanying material (e.g. software on a disc or CD) Definitions Have you ever heard about turning to the professional online writing services? That could one of the main sources with the help of what you will be sure about the high quality of your dissertation. Prime Writings is the one site I recommend you to go. What is the more, the prices are affordable.

The answer to this question completely depends on your field of study. Any given field will have its own norms, and they can differ quite a bit from one to another. For example, in the sciences, the “three papers stapled together” dissertation is not uncommon: an introduction; three chapters, each of which is taken almost directly (or directly) from a journal article that you have already published; and a conclusion/future research directions chapter. In the humanities, the expectations are completely different. So, how can you answer your own question? Read a few dissertations in your field of study. About half of those should have been written by your dissertation advisor’s students.

The best dissertation is the completed, submitted, and approved dissertation. It is not a competition. Even the word PhD can be read as PhinisheD! So worry less about making your dissertation the best, worry more about pushing yourself, doing honest and quality work and crossing the finished line. Best of luck!
The best dissertation is one that earns a high grade for research, thoroughness and themes support, and thus brings you the desired degree.
Finding or writing the best dissertation should be from your filed of interest or field of study. First know what your interests are then decide from there.

A good dissertation is a done dissertation -it gets you out of the door with a diploma in hand. An excellent dissertation is the one that leads to several publications once you are out of the door so that you get tenure or simply publish your way into a tenure-track job.
